task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about the subtraction feature of the Calc App.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is substarction.

example.p: You want to subtract 2 from 3.. The equation will look like, 3-2=1. You will enter 3, click on minus (-) and then enter 2. Then click on equal (=).
The result 1 appears on the screen.
